 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    
A set of packages for accessing, manipulating and generating TV-Anytime data.

See:
          Description

Packages
bbc.rd.mpeg7 Provides classes describing MPEG7 time and duration types.
bbc.rd.tvanytime Provides classes and exceptions for basic types required by other packages in the TVAnytime API.
bbc.rd.tvanytime.contentReferencing Provides classes representing a TVA Content Referencing table and objects that it contains.
bbc.rd.tvanytime.creditsInformation Provides classes representing a TVA Credits Information table and objects that it contains.
bbc.rd.tvanytime.dvb Provides dvb-specific tools for handling TVA fragments.
bbc.rd.tvanytime.groupInformation Provides classes representing a TVA Group Information table, and all objects that it contains.
bbc.rd.tvanytime.programInformation Provides classes representing a TVA Program Information table and objects that it contains.
bbc.rd.tvanytime.programLocation Provides classes representing a TVA Program Location table and objects that it contains.
bbc.rd.tvanytime.search Provides interfaces and exceptions for searching on in-memory and remotely queried tables.
bbc.rd.tvanytime.segmentInformation Provides classes representing a TVA Segment Information table and objects that it contains.
bbc.rd.tvanytime.serviceInformation Provides classes representing a TVA Service Information table and objects that it contains.
bbc.rd.tvanytime.util Provides classes containing useful tools for convering between data types used with the TV Anytime API and tables.
bbc.rd.tvanytime.xml Provides classes for creating in-memory TVA tables from an XML data source.

 

A set of packages for accessing, manipulating and generating TV-Anytime data.

(c) BBC Research & Development, 2005

Version:
1.3
Author:
Tristan Ferne
See Also:, TV Anytime Forum
